description: Create the user experience and visual design through iterative design exploration and validation.
objectives: Establish visual design system and brand application
Obtain Agent Principal approval before development

steps.stepName: Create information architecture and user flows
steps.description: Define how content and features are organized and how users navigate through the application.

tasks.task: Map all pages, sections, and content of the application
Design user flow diagrams for key journeys

steps.agentPrompt: Create a comprehensive information architecture based on user stories and personas. Design clear navigation and user flows for key journeys. Present as structured specifications.

steps.description: Develop initial layouts and structure without visual polish to validate concepts quickly.

tasks.task: Create layout specifications for all key screens
Explore multiple layout options for key flows
Iterate based on feedback before high-fidelity

steps.agentPrompt: Generate detailed wireframe specifications in text/markdown format. Describe layout, component placement, and interactions. Provide multiple options for key screens.

steps.stepName: Design visual identity and design system
steps.description: Establish the visual language and systematic design components for the application.

tasks.task: Define color palette (primary, secondary, semantic colors)
Select and pair typography (headings, body, monospace)
Define iconography style and icon set
Define spacing scale and grid system
Create design tokens for systematic implementation

steps.agentPrompt: Create a complete design system specification including colors, typography, spacing, and component patterns. Output as design tokens (CSS variables or JSON) ready for implementation.

steps.description: Design detailed specifications for all screens and states.

tasks.task: Create detailed specifications for all screens
Define component library with all UI elements
Specify designs for all breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Include all states (empty, loading, error, success)

steps.agentPrompt: Generate comprehensive UI specifications for each screen. Include component details, responsive behavior, and all states. Output in a format the Frontend Agent can implement directly.

steps.description: Create clickable prototypes and validate designs.

tasks.task: Iterate on designs based on findings

steps.agentPrompt: Create prototype specifications that can be implemented as a working prototype. Define test scenarios for key flows. Document any usability concerns for Agent Principal review.

steps.stepName: Design review and Agent Principal approval
steps.description: Present designs for formal review and obtain approval to proceed to development.
steps.agentPrompt: Prepare a comprehensive design summary for Agent Principal approval. Include accessibility considerations. Package all design assets for handoff to development agents.
